Job Posting:167465 - Position: S25 Software Developer Co-op/Intern 167465 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 03/13/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 02/27/2025 02:47 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Nokia Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2025 - Summer S25 Software Developer Co-op/Intern 167465 Co-op Position Ottawa, ON Canada 4 or 8 months To be confirmed Salary Currency CAD Salary Salary Range $ Job Description Salary Not Available, 0 Major List $34,480 to $84,480 CAD per year Application Link: Software Developer Co-op/Intern • Position: Software Developer Co-op/Intern • Number of Position(s): 1 • Duration: 4 Months + • Date: April 28th, 2025, to August 29th, 2025 Location: Ottawa, Canada • HOW YOU WILL CONTRIBUTE AND WHAT YOU WILL LEARN As a part of our team, you will: • Work with a small, talented development team on a security product • Develop in Java • Use dev tools like git, Jenkins, Jira, Confluence, VMs, docker, Kubernetes • Working in a CI/CD environment with virtual labs and other cloud environments • Optimize Build and CI/CD Processes: Enhance CI/CD, whether it is building systems or test automation framework, focusing on speed and reliability of builds and deployments. Develop tools that automates development's day to day tasks • About Us Come create the technology that helps the world act together Nokia is committed to innovation and technology leadership across mobile, fixed and cloud networks. Your career here will have a positive impact on people's lives and will help us build the capabilities needed for a more productive, sustainable, and inclusive world. We challenge ourselves to create an inclusive way of working where we are open to new ideas, empowered to take risks and fearless to bring our authentic selves to work What we offer Nokia offers continuous learning opportunities, well-being programs to support you mentally and physically, opportunities to join and get supported by employee resource groups, mentoring programs and highly diverse teams with an inclusive culture where people thrive and are empowered. Nokia is committed to inclusion and is an equal opportunity employer Nokia has received the following recognitions for its commitment to inclusion & equality: • One of the World's Most Ethical Companies by Ethisphere • Gender-Equality Index by Bloomberg Workplace Pride Global Benchmark • At Nokia, we act inclusively and respect the uniqueness of people. Nokia's employment decisions are made regardless of race, color, national or ethnic origin, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, marital status, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law. We are committed to a culture of inclusion built upon our core value of respect. Join us and be part of a company where you will feel included and empowered to succeed. Job Requirements EDUCATIONAL RECOMMENDATIONS Currently a candidate for a Master's, bachelor's degree or Diploma in Computer Science, Computer Systems Engineering, Software Engineering or a related field with an accredited school in Canada. KEY SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE • Excellent programming skills with Java and Java APIs • Passion for software development and problem-solving • The ability to ask questions and communicate your ideas to those around you • Experience with Java, Python and or Go Experience with Automation techniques • It would be nice if you also had: • Experience with Linux and bash scripting • Good understanding of design patterns • Experience with Robot, specifically UI Automation. • Experience with CI/CD tools: Jenkins, gitlab Experience with docker, k8s and rest APIs. • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://fa-evmr-saasfaprod1.fa.ocs.oraclecloud.com/hcmUI/CandidateExperience/en/sites/CX_1/job/17344 Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
